question: Rachel had to complete 10 pages of math homework. If she had to complete 3 more pages of reading homework than math homework. How many pages did she have to complete in all?
response:
Rachel had to complete 10 pages of math homework. If she had to complete 3 more pages of reading homework than math homework, it means she had to complete 10 + 3 = 13 pages of reading homework.

The total number of pages Rachel had to complete in all is 10 pages of math homework + 13 pages of reading homework = 23 pages.

The answer is 23.
